title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Marinate chicken pieces in yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry the marinated chicken until cooked through and slightly charred.
In a pan, heat butter and sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste, tomatoes, and spices (garam masala, turmeric, chili powder). Cook until thick.
Stir in cream and simmer until smooth.
Add the cooked chicken to the sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with coriander and serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
ingredients: 500g boneless chicken breast or thighs, cut into cubes
1/2 cup heavy cream (or coconut cream for dairy-free)
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté onions, garlic, carrots, and celery until soft.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in tomato paste, canned tomatoes, and Italian herbs.
Simmer the sauce for at least 30 minutes until rich and thick.
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Serve spaghetti topped with the bolognese sauce and grated Parmesan cheese.
